cache.description: Whether or not to test again a provider if it is already listed either in 'succeeded.json' or 'failed.json' upon subsequent relaunching of the script.

groupsToTest.description: Number of IPTV groups to fetch channels from. The group(s) are selected randomly among all IPTV genres of the provider.

channelsToTest.description: Number of IPTV channels to check the liveness. The channel(s) are selected randomly among all channels from the result of selected genres (see 'groupsToTest').

retestSuccess.description: Whether to test again the success.json content (if file exists)

anyOf.title: Check the endpoint liveness with HTTP
Check the stream liveness with FFMPEG
